propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.pending: If true, the pending indicator is shown.
propDescriptions.pendingIndicator: Element placed before the children if the button is in pending state.
propDescriptions.pendingPosition: The pending indicator can be positioned on the start, end, or the center of the button.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

pending.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

pendingIndicator.description: Styles applied to the pendingIndicator element.

pendingIndicatorCenter.description: Styles applied to the pendingIndicator element if {{conditions}}.

pendingIndicatorStart.description: Styles applied to the pendingIndicator element if {{conditions}}.

pendingIndicatorEnd.description: Styles applied to the pendingIndicator element if {{conditions}}.

endIconPendingEnd.description: Styles applied to the endIcon element if {{conditions}}.

startIconPendingStart.description: Styles applied to the startIcon element if {{conditions}}.

labelPendingCenter.description: Styles applied to the label element if {{conditions}}.
